domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
Here’s something that’s far from harmless: 

Trump claiming 99% of Coronavirus cases are “harmless” when in fact 15 to 20% are severe enough to require hospitalization & many of those never come home.

That lie directly causes more deaths. And Trump surely knows that. He has to.
